## 1.0.0 (2018-10-23)

* Don't accept escape sequences in "meta"

## 0.3.0 (2018-09-14)

* Update to new acorn 6 interface
* Change license to MIT

## 0.2.1 (2018-02-13)

* Relicense under Apache-2.0 and AGPL-3.0-or-later

## 0.2.0 (2017-12-26)

* Improve compatibility with acorn-dynamic-import

## 0.1.0 (2017-12-19)

Initial release
